layout.title: Pouria Darandi
layout.description: Pouria Darandi is a full-stack developer with a passion for building high-quality, scalable, and secure web applications. He is a self-taught developer who has worked with various technologies, including React, Vue, Next.js, and Django. He has experience in both frontend and backend development, and is proficient in both JavaScript and TypeScript. He is also a freelancer and has worked on various projects, including a web development portfolio, a game development platform, and a mobile app development platform. If you are interested in learning more about Pouria Darandi, his projects, or his experience, you can find more information on his website.
